NoticeData.Contents: New World 8 Added - New World 8, HELHEIM, has opened! - 50 stages, ranging from 351-400, have been added. - New grade, Sacred Class equipment has been added! - Recipes for making a total of 25 types of equipment, including weapons, armor, belts, necklaces, and rings, have been added, with 5 kinds for each type. - 6 new types of food have been added! - Recipes for crafting these 6 types of food have been added. - Level data up to a maximum of 500 levels has been added. Collection System Improvements - Convenience features have been added to the collection system. - A shortcut feature to obtain the materials needed for the collection has been added. - The collection list sorting function has been improved. - It is sorted in the order of immediate completion possible, some conditions met, and no progress made. - A shortcut to the collection menu from the crafting menu has been added. - Stats obtained from the collection can be checked in the stage, arena, and world boss battle preparation screens. In-Game Monster Collection Improvement - A presentation for checking items received when collecting monster collection rewards has been added. - The main lobby now displays information related to monster collection progress. - It shows the level and the remaining time until reward claim. - Migration feature added - When rewards are updated, migration can be conducted to renew the agreement with new rewards. April Event - Balance adjustments in celebration of the World 8 update. - The block and required material quantities for crafting equipment in Worlds 1-7 have been changed. Game Improvements - The collection list has been expanded, and some reward balances have been adjusted. - The SKIP feature for World Bosses now skips the entire battle. - A retry button has been added after clearing the last stage of the event dungeon. - The maximum amount of AP potion that can be used with the SWEEP feature during stage progression has been increased from 10 to 20. - The REPEAT feature during stage progression now allows for the use of 1 bottle of AP potion. - The crystal substitute cost for crafting equipment with legendary-grade materials has been reduced by 33%.

Collection System Update - A collection system has been added that allows players to gather equipment, food, costumes, titles, and materials to acquire Stats. - The stats obtained through this system include two types: the existing + stats and the % stats, which are being added for the first time. - % stats are calculated in combination with existing skill buffs, applying the percentage after summing all + stats. - CDMG is an abbreviation for Critical Damage, a stat that increases the additional damage dealt on a critical hit. Monster Collection In-Game Start, Change, and Claim Feature Added - The functionality to start Monster Collection, change amounts, and claim rewards, which was previously only possible through the PC version launcher, has been made available in-game for players. - As a result, users who do not use the PC version can also receive various rewards through the Monster Collection. Monster Collection Ruby Dust Reward Added - Ruby Dust, used in the collection, has been added as a reward for the Monster Collection. - Plans are in place to provide various uses for this material item in the future. SPD Related Combat Processing Change - The display of stats owned by players has been changed to not use decimals. - In arenas, world bosses, and stages, the processing of speed after using a skill, which was previously treated the same as attacks, has been changed. Now, when a skill is used, the SPD value is recalculated by multiplying by 0.9 instead of 0.6. Through these changes, the probability of taking another turn after using a skill has significantly increased. - This change aims to reduce the cost of using skills, thereby increasing the value of skill equipment and emphasizing the diversity of combat strategy with skill use going forward. Bugfix - Fixed an issue where the announcement image did not display in the main lobby at the start of the World Boss season. - Fixed an issue where the levels of avatars in the arena were displayed abnormally.
Libplanet Update - Making systems faster at processing activities. - Optimization of data structures.
